case.state: Who's ready to play a game with the Ultimate Supreme Leader!
Gentlemen, the Ultimate Supreme Leader is here to play!
Who's ready for a game of poker with the leader of D.I.C.E!
Heeeeeeeey, wait a minute! This isn't D.I.C.E headquarters?
Normally, only members of D.I.C.E can gamble away their possessions for a chance to see their leader naked. But I'll make an exception for you chumps since I'm so nice!
Consider yourselves lucky I'm joining your game tonight. As a supreme leader, I got places to be, people to talk to, pranks to pull.
Hey, dealer! Hey! Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, HEY! Gimmie ~cards.text~ cards!
Can I have ~cards.text~? Pleaaaaaaase?
You better make these ~cards.text~ good, dealer!
Alriiiiiight, gimmie ~cards.text~!
I want ~cards.text~ cards!
~cards.text~ cards, dealer! And make it snappy!
~cards.text~ cards! ~cards.text~, ~cards.text~, ~cards.text~!
Let's see those cards!
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. That should do it.
I don't care anymore. Just gimmie ~cards.text~ cards or whatever.
~cards.text~.
Cards. Any kind. Doesn't matter.
Ughhhh, do I have to?
Is this really necessary?
What is this hand? Dealer, do you... hate me? WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!! You're so meaaan!
D-Dealer! Why did you give me this hand!?
Wooooow, do you want to see me naked that badly.
NOOOOOOOOO! How could I get such a terrible hand! Whhhhhhhhhhy?
C'mooooon, I want a good hand, ~dealer~!
Hmmmmmm, I'll tell you my hand if you tell me yours, ~player~!

Noooooo, I wanted a good hand!
Just kidding, this hand is unbeatable!
Oooooh, what a great hand! ...That's a lie, this hand is terrible! Or maybe I'm just lying about the quality of my hand!
Pro-tip: Always lie about your hand. You always get the beeeest results!
Good thing I'm so short, so that I can fit more text in my textbox!

state.text: Oh no, a bad hand! Good thing I'm such a great liar!

case.state: So, how's everyone doing? Starting to sweat yet?
Oh me, oh my, I wonder who will lose this round?
Need any pointers, ~player~? I am a professional gambler, after all. D.I.C.E plays games every Saturday.

state.text: ♫ All my friends are heathens, take it slooow. Wait for them to ask you who you knooow. ♪

case.state: ♪ I'm gonna live, 'till I die! I'm gonna laugh, instead of cry! ♫
Nice. Or not nice.
This hand is shit! I'll lose for sure!
This hand isn't fit for a Supreme Leader! I want a reshuffle!
I want a better hand!

state.text: Meh. This card suits one of you losers better than it suits me!

case.state:
OH NO! What shall I do now!?
...Just kidding, this hand is just okay!
Hey, ~player~ Hey! What hand do you think I have?
Hmm... What hand do you think I have? Do you think it's a good hand? A bad hand? An okay hand?

Not gonna lie, this is a great hand!
